Articles.Content: Hi, this has been a problem for me since I first got the game, but whenever my planes fly at medium speeds there are always gray-ish wind flying everywhere around my plane like a sonic boom, and its quite annoying, it's also lagging my game. At high speeds it looks like the plane is on fire when I'm only around Mach 2. I suspect the Concorde did not look like this. Is there a way to turn it off?

1st of all you cabn always turn those effects down (or even 100% off). go in settings and find the graphics tab, then find the aerodynamic fx quality thing and set that to lower.

2nd, its just something that at leats for me looks neat, and helps you tell when youre going too fast basied on the coloring.
